subject: Order #SSN4545
description_text:
Hi,

I don't know how to contact you to get a response, as I am not hearing back
from you at any point.
I paid for express delivery for my order #SSN4545 and should have arrived
yesterday. The tracking number is SF6047152633735 with SF Express and it
has not been updated since the 11th of December. What am I supposed to do?
I want a partial refund on the delivery, this is unacceptable.

[image: image.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi Bogdan Branisteanu,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. This shipping channel is currently at full capacity, so we will arrange an urgent UPS shipment for you. Delivery is expected on the 21st.

Hi

Can you share a new tracking number?

Thanks,
Bogdan
Hi Bogdan Branisteanu,    This is your logistics tracking link. Estimated delivery on the 22nd.  â€‹https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510406405439/trackdetails
